text: Kordon () is a rural locality (a settlement) in Kishertsky District, Perm Krai, Russia. The population was 1,327 as of 2010. There are 24 streets. == Geography == It is located between Bolshaya and Malaya Molyobka. == References == Category:Rural localities in Kishertsky District
title: Kordon, Kishertsky District, Perm Krai
